<title level="1" right="Rules">[Counteracting a Magical Hazard](/Rules.aspx?ID=678)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 521 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some magical hazards can be [counteracted](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) using [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78). These hazards’ spell levels and counteract DCs are listed in their stat block. Counteracting a hazard otherwise works like using a skill check to disable the hazard.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Counteracting a Magical Hazard
